Package app.controller.util

Class CookieUtil

java.lang.Object
app.controller.util.CookieUtil
public abstract class CookieUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Provides static methods for working with cookies.

    • getCookie

      public static javax.servlet.http.Cookie getCookie​(javax.servlet.http.Cookie[] cookies, java.lang.String name)
      Gets a cookie from the array of cookies by its name.
      Parameters:
      cookies - cookies array
      name - cookie name
      Returns:
      cookie object or null if cookie was not found

    • get

      public static java.lang.String get​(javax.servlet.http.Cookie[] cookies, java.lang.String name)
      Gets a cookie from the array of cookies by its name.
      Parameters:
      cookies - cookies array
      name - cookie name
      Returns:
      value of the cookie or null if cookie was not found

    • get

      public static java.lang.String get​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, java.lang.String name)
      Gets a cookie from the httpServletRequest by its name.
      Parameters:
      request - for searching cookie
      name - cookie name
      Returns:
      value of the cookie or null if cookie was not found

    • add

      public static void add​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value, int expiresIn)
      Creates, configures and adds cookie object to the response.
      Parameters:
      response - target to add cookie
      name - of the cookie
      value - of the cookie
      expiresIn - life time of the cookie in seconds

    • remove

      public static void remove​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, java.lang.String name)
      Removes cookie in the response.
      Parameters:
      response - to remove
      name - of the cookie to delete
